TopicTitle: Help why cant i edit my profile i comfirmed it

Articles.Content:
First, you need to be far more descriptive.

Second, you'll be able to if you try again. Users with less than 5 posts are classed as "Curious George" and have much of the forum cut-off. Within an hour of making the fifth post they are upgraded to "Bottle Rocketeer", enabling all forum functionality.
